contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album| <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Leif Garrett | Type = studio | Artist = [[Leif Garrett]] | Cover = Leif Garrett - Leif Garrett (album).jpeg | Released = 1977 | Recorded = 1977 | Genre = [[Pop rock]], [[teen pop]], [[soft rock]] | Length = 25:40 | Label = [[Atlantic Records|Atlantic]] | Producer = Michael Lloyd | Last album = | This album = '''''Leif Garrett'''''<br />(1977) | Next album = ''[[Feel The Need]]''<br />(1978) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4|5}} [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r38671|pure_url=yes}} link] | noprose = yes }} '''''Leif Garrett''''' is the debut studio album by [[United States|American]] singer-actor [[Leif Garrett]], released in 1977 by [[Atlantic Records|Atlantic]]. Garrett recorded and released the album at the age of 15. ==Track listing== {{Track listing | all_writing = Various Artists | title1 = [[The Wanderer (Dion song)|The Wanderer]] || length1 = 2:41 || note1 = [[Ernie Maresca]] | title2 = [[California Girls]] || length2 = 2:27 || note2 = [[Mike Love]]/[[Brian Wilson]] | title3 = [[Put Your Head on My Shoulder]] || length3 = 2:45 || note3 = [[Paul Anka]] | title4 = I Wanna Share a Dream With You || length4 = 2:15 || note4 = Michael Lloyd | title5 = [[Johnny B. Goode]] || length5 = 2:32 || note5 = [[Chuck Berry]] | title6 = [[Runaround Sue]] || length6 = 2:26 || note6 = [[Dion DiMucci]]/[[Ernie Maresca]] | title7 = [[That's All]] || length7 = 3:01 || note7 = [[Ervin Drake]] | title8 = [[Bad to Me]] || length8 = 2:49 || note8 = [[Lennon–McCartney]] | title9 = Special Kind of Girl || length9 = 2:34 || note9 = Roger Atkins/John d'Andrea/Michael Lloyd | title10 = [[Surfin' U.S.A. (song)|Surfin' U.S.A.]] || length10 = 2:10 || note10 = [[Chuck Berry]]/[[Brian Wilson]] }} == Personnel == *[[Leif Garrett]] – [[singing|vocals]] *[[Jay Graydon]] – [[guitars]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Leif Garrett}} [[Category:Leif Garrett albums]] [[Category:1977 debut albums]] [[Category:Atlantic Records albums]] {{1970s-pop-album-stub}}
